fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
dHedge is a decentralized asset management protocol, connecting investment managers with investors on the Ethereum blockchain in a permissionless, non-custodial, trustless fashion. It is powered by Synthetix Protocol. Users can put their capital to work in different strategies based on a transparent track record of the various traders.

[dHEDGE website](https://www.dhedge.org)
[What is dHEDGE - Docs](https://docs.dhedge.org)

The best way to keep track of dHedge developments is through their [Discord](https://discord.gg/BAWTbRA)  channel.
